scripts.build: tsc && npm run fix-paths && node fix-imports.js
scripts.fix-paths: mkdir -p lib && cp -f lib/functions/src/index.js* lib/ || true
scripts.prepare-shared: npm run create-shared-dirs && npm run copy-shared-files
scripts.create-shared-dirs: mkdir -p src/shared/discord src/shared/types/reports src/shared/utils src/shared/firebase src/shared/errors src/shared/config
scripts.copy-shared-files: cp -f ../shared/discord/*.ts src/shared/discord/ && cp -f ../shared/types/*.ts src/shared/types/ && cp -f ../shared/types/reports/*.ts src/shared/types/reports/ && cp -f ../shared/utils/*.ts src/shared/utils/ && cp -f ../shared/firebase/*.ts src/shared/firebase/ && cp -f ../shared/errors/*.ts src/shared/errors/ && cp -f ../shared/config/*.ts src/shared/config/
scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.predeploy: npm run clean:lib && npm run prepare-shared && npm run build && npm run clean-shared && npm run test
